definition: see 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation
Chihkan Tower (formerly Fort Provintia) in Tainan, Taiwan (also written 赤崁樓|赤崁楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2])

sentences.english: Encased at the tip of each 25-foot-long rod are seeds provided by China’s Kunming Institute of Botany.
sentences.chinese: 每个25长的突触顶端嵌有由昆明植物园提供的种子。

sentences.english: Stainless steel polished tank with filter imbedded in, which is good-looking.
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢抛光箱体，滤器嵌在箱体内，外形美观。

sentences.english: North entrance to the embedded Taming stone, quite detailed records.
sentences.chinese: 门外北向嵌有塔铭刻石，记载颇详。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an inserted inter adsorption game ball and a ball bat.
sentences.chinese: 一种嵌插式相互吸附的游戏球及球拍。

sentences.english: The table is inlaid with an ivory flower-pattern.
sentences.chinese: 桌面上嵌着象牙雕成的花。

sentences.english: His face was squarish with a high forehead heavy jaw and broad nose.
sentences.chinese: 他一章方脸上嵌着高额头，粗大的下颚和蒜头鼻。

sentences.english: At the southern end of South America lies the jewel of Patagonia.
sentences.chinese: 南美洲南端的巴塔哥尼亚嵌上了宝石一样。

sentences.english: Julia scowled at her jeweled tortoise .
sentences.chinese: 这时朱莉娅怒视着那只嵌着钻石的乌龟。

sentences.english: The first two carriages of the train telescoped in the crash.
sentences.chinese: 火车撞车时前两节车箱叠嵌在一起了。

sentences.english: Qianyan Temple is really a treasure place with the talent of the mountains and water.
sentences.chinese: 嵌岩寺，不愧是一处汲天地之灵气的风水宝地。

sentences.english: Qianyan temple is the outcome of the period.
sentences.chinese: 嵌岩寺便是这时期的产物。

sentences.english: The mosaic pattern on an owl butterfly egg looks like a landing pad.
sentences.chinese: 猫头鹰蝶卵上嵌花式图案看上去好像停机坪。

sentences.english: His face was squarish, with a high forehead, heavy jaw, and broad nose.
sentences.chinese: 他一张方脸上嵌着高额头，粗大的下颚和蒜头鼻。

sentences.english: The positioning block is embedded on the transverse part of the notches.
sentences.chinese: 所述定位锁嵌于所述槽口的横段部分。

sentences.english: I dreamed Assef was standing in the doorway of my hospital room, brass ball still in his eye socket.
sentences.chinese: 我梦见阿塞夫站在病房的门口，眼眶仍嵌着铜球。

sentences.english: Is it big lacquer fittings with ivory wedged ?

definition: to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation
to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish
variant of 鎦金|镏金[liu2 jin1]
